import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { CSSTransitionGroup } from 'react-transition-group'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import * as config from './../../constants/config'; import callApi from './../../utils/apiCaller'; import Cleave from 'cleave.js/react'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Validator from 'react-forms-validator'; import Checkbox from '@material-ui/core/Checkbox'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; // Note: include import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; import ModalCalling from './../../components/Customers/ModalCalling'; class InvoiceInfo extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { orders: [] }; } componentWillMount(){ var {match} = this.props; if(match) { var id = match.params.id; callApi('GET', config.ORDER_URL+'/invoice/'+id, null).then(res => { if(res.data && res.data.status){ this.setState({ order: res.data.order }); } }); } } render() { console.log(this.state.order); return (
